main.node

Class FingerTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.node.FingerTable

  • public class FingerTable
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the finger table of an internal node. It contains the node's information about the ring structure. It provides several methods to recover the information in case of a remote node failure
    Author:
    Alfonso Marco, Martini Davide Distributed Systems class (AY 2017/2018), University of Padua, Master's degree in Computer Engineering.

      This method is called by the Stabilizer to delete a node form the table.

      This method is called by the Stabilizer to fill the finger table after a deleteNode() invocation

      This method is called to get the ith finger in the table

      • updateIthFinger

        public void updateIthFinger(int i,
                            java.net.InetSocketAddress node)
        This method is called to update the ith finger of the table
        Parameters:
        i - Index of the table to update
        node - Node address to be inserted

      • getIthFinger

        public java.net.InetSocketAddress getIthFinger(int i)
        This method is called to get the ith finger in the table
        Parameters:
        i - Index of the table
        Returns:
        The address node in the ith line of table

      • deleteNode

        public void deleteNode(java.net.InetSocketAddress addr)
        This method is called by the Stabilizer to delete a node form the table. It is called when the successor node fails and it sets all the unreachable entries to null.
        Parameters:
        addr - Address of the node to be deleted

      • fillSuccessor

        public void fillSuccessor(InternalNode node)
        This method is called by the Stabilizer to fill the finger table after a deleteNode() invocation
        Parameters:
        node - It is a reference of the invoker node

      • getOldSucc

        public java.net.InetSocketAddress getOldSucc()
        This method is called to get the invoker node's old successor with concurrency control
        Returns:
        The address of the old successor

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This method is called to print the finger table
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The string representing the finger table
